meanings.definition: A Sikh temple or place of worship.
meanings.sent1: The gurdwaras in our town have beautiful domes.
meanings.sent2: People gather at the gurdwaras to pray and sing hymns.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally walked into the gurdwaras thinking it was a library!
meanings.sent4: The gurdwaras stand tall like guardians of peace in the community.
meanings.sent5: The golden decorations of the gurdwaras shimmered in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: We visited many gurdwaras during our trip to India.
meanings.sent2: The gurdwaras are important places for the Sikh community.
meanings.sent3: Imagine a world where gurdwaras grew like flowers in every garden!
meanings.sent4: The gurdwaras dotted the landscape like jewels on a crown.
meanings.sent5: The peaceful atmosphere of the gurdwaras enveloped all who entered.
